entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -27.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 12:50 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -27.5°C

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -32.6°C
Wind: WNW 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
